name: Matrix2DCreationDict
summary: Simple object passed to createMatrix2D to initialize a matrix.

properties.name: anchorPoint
properties.summary: Point to rotate around, specified as a dictionary object with x and y properties, where { x: 0.5, y: 0.5 } represents the center of whatever is being rotated.

properties.name: rotate
properties.summary: Rotation angle, in degrees. See the rotate method for a discussion of rotation.

properties.name: scale
properties.summary: Scale the matrix by the specified scaling factor. The same scaling factor is used for both horizontal and vertical scaling.
